code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';import{uniqBy}from'lodash';export var getCardItems=function getCardItems(state){return uniqBy(state.card.items,function(i){return i._id;});};export var getTotalPrice=createSelector(getCardItems,function(items){debugger;return items.reduce(function(total,item){return total+item.price*item.quantity;},0);});
